name: eiderdown
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a thick covering for the top of a bed, filled with soft feathers or warm material: She snuggled beneath the eiderdown. Compare
duvet
Kelly Ratcliffe/EyeEm/GettyImages
[ U ] the soft feathers of a duck, used for filling pillows, bed covers, etc.
